I'll Come Back Someday

12 Sep 2013

Here's another song from waaaaaaay back. 

I don't even know where this song is anymore. Probably buried deep within some backup of a backup of a backup drive. And it's on myspace for cryaahefu out loud.. I haven't even logged into myspace for years.

But it still exists, like internet amber. It would feel strange to delete it.
